meaning_str.bing:
n. 餐；进餐(时间)；〈英〉一次挤奶量
v. 吃饭；碾碎
网络. 膳食；三餐；伙食

餐；进餐(时间)；〈英〉一次挤奶量

1.en: Or to have your meals at specified times during the day that you know from experience will be appropriate to avoid getting too hungry.
1.cn: 或者是在一天中的特定的时间进餐，这个时间你可以根据经验推算出来，这个时间可以避免你变得太饥饿。

2.en: "It might be, 'I can drive her to PT for the next five Thursdays, ' or 'I can bring meals for the next six months, ' " Mintz says.
2.cn: “我可以下五个周四开车带她去锻炼或者下六个月提供饭。”明茨说。

3.en: My daughter eat three meals a day too slowly. It's annoyed for me to see her to eat that looks like the meal is too distasteful to eat.
3.cn: 我女儿一天三餐饭实在吃得太慢了。看到她那吃饭的样子实在是令人恼火，就好像饭菜的味道非常难吃，简直是难以下咽似的

0.en: I'm poor, so I go to McDonald's and Taco Bell a lot for my meals.
0.cn: 我是个穷鬼，我常会去麦当劳与塔可钟去吃便宜餐点。

1.en: Well, I thought it was great, Topanga. Thank you. I don't get a lot of home-cooked meals.
1.cn: 我觉得很美味，托庞嘉，谢谢你，我不总能吃到家里做的饭。

2.en: The MU cafeteria serves a full buffet, three meals a day. I personally believe we have some of the best chefs in the world.
2.cn: 本校餐厅菜色齐全，一天供三餐，我个人认为我们有世界级的厨师。

3.en: Before your speech, avoid large meals and dairy products which will make you feel like you need to clear your throat incessantly.
3.cn: 演讲前，避免吃过多食物或是奶制品这些会让你一直想清喉咙

4.en: Are you sure? Yes. I may have lost my guidance system and my girlfriend, but I still have a colon full of yesterday's meals to keep me company.
4.cn: 你确定吗？是的。虽然我可能失去了导向系统和女友，但我结肠里还有昨天吃的食物陪伴着我。

5.en: In the beginning, you can only eat about two ounces at a time, so you'll need to eat six small meals throughout the day to get all the nutrients that you need.
5.cn: 刚开始，你每次只能吃约六十克的食物，所以你每天需要吃六顿小餐才能获取足够的营养。
